let dataPointTypes = flow.get("dataPointTypes");
flow.set("dataPointType", dataPointTypes.find((dataPointType) => dataPointType.id === msg.payload));

flow.set("BME280I2CAdapterUUID", i2cAdapterGID.split(":")[1])
